sense.def:
To stitch pieces of material together
pomeni spojiti kose blaga s šivanko in nitjo.

seg.quote: They were cut out and stitched together.
She picked up her embroidery and started stitching.

sense.def:
A stitch
je eden od kratkih kosov niti, ki ga vidimo na sešitem kosu blaga.

seg.quote: ...the little stitches in the canvas she was embroidering.

sense.def:
Kadar zdravniki
stitch a wound
ali
stitch a wound up
, uporabijo posebno iglo in nit, da sešijejo kose kože.

seg.quote: The doctor who stitched it should have another look at it tomorrow.

sense.def:
A stitch
je tudi kos niti, ki ga uporabimo za zašitje rane.

To have a stitch
pomeni občutiti ostro bolečino ob robu želodca, navadno po hitrem teku ali močnem smehu.

seg.quote: I began to have a bad stitch.

sense.def:
To be in stitches
pomeni, da se ne moremo nehati smejati;
